title: Person Of Interest Cast Shares Their All Time Favorite Scenes
author: POISuit
comment: I really don't understand how CBS can cancel Person of Interest, yet keep crap like Elementary and reality shows.
That Root scene is 100% the most badass thing to ever happen on this show, and that scene in Razgovor with Shaw and Gen is proabably one of my 10 favorite ever scenes in the show.

this is by far the best show ive ever watched... 
im sad that it had to end, but for the first time ever im actually fine with the series ending, each death made sense. everything made sense.
The scene with Shaw and Jen the 10 year old is SPECIAL! it shows Shaw does have feelings, and it took a 10 year old girl named Jen to bring it out of her. SPECIAL SCENE!!
I will NEVER forget this show...I mean literally I can't since I have all the seasons on DVD XD
description: POI stars Amy Acker, Kevin Chapman, Michael Emerson, Jim Caviezel, and Sarah Shahi discuss their favorite scenes from all 5 seasons of the CBS drama. Take a look at which memorable moments made the cut. Catch the season finale on Tuesday, June 21, 10/9c on CBS.
